notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: FD, YXJ, LSH and LFM conceived the ideas. FD, FW, LFM, LSH collected DNA samples. FD, XLL, CMH, JYG and QZ analyzed the data. All authors contributed to the writing of the paper, with major input from FD and CMH. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
